name: Taliyah
title: the Stoneweaver
lore: Taliyah is a nomadic mage from Shurima, torn between teenage wonder and adult responsibility. She has crossed nearly all of Valoran on a journey to learn the true nature of her growing powers, though more recently she has returned to protect her tribe. Some have mistaken her compassion for weakness and paid the ultimate price—for beneath Taliyah's youthful demeanor is a will strong enough to move mountains, and a spirit fierce enough to make the earth itself tremble.
blurb: Taliyah is a nomadic mage from Shurima, torn between teenage wonder and adult responsibility. She has crossed nearly all of Valoran on a journey to learn the true nature of her growing powers, though more recently she has returned to protect her tribe...
allytips: Try to throw enemies into Unraveled Earth using Seismic Shove.
Remember, you don't always have to ride Weaver's Wall.
Once you have Rylai's Crystal Scepter, casting Threaded Volley at enemies chasing you is a great way of making them regret everything.
enemytips: When Taliyah casts Unraveled Earth in the lane, be on the lookout for Seismic Shove. If she throws you into her minefield, the throws and stones will break your bones.
Taliyah's Threaded Volley is locked into a direction. If she's throwing rocks at you, dodge to the side!

riot_spell_q.name: Threaded Volley
riot_spell_q.description: Taliyah throws a volley of missiles in a target direction, moving freely as she does. This works the ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on worked ground, she only throws one missile.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Hurls 5 rocks in a direction, each dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Subsequent hits on the same enemy deal {{ e2 }}% reduced damage. Creates Worked Ground for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Casting Threaded Volley on Worked Ground only hurls one rock but its cost is reduced to {{ e7 }} mana.

riot_spell_w.name: Seismic Shove
riot_spell_w.description: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within in a direction of her choosing.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Taliyah targets an area. After a short delay, enemies caught within the area will be pushed and dealt {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

You can control the direction enemies will be pushed by clicking and dragging your mouse in a line.

riot_spell_e.name: Unraveled Earth
riot_spell_e.description: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield that explodes if enemies dash through it or are pushed/pulled through it.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Places a field of dash-sensitive traps that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow enemies in the area by {{ f2 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds, the traps explode, dealing damage again.

Enemies dashing, being pushed, or being pulled through Unraveled Earth will trigger traps, taking {{ f3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage from each trap (maximum 4, each hit after the first deals {{ f4 }}% less damage).

riot_spell_r.name: Weaver's Wall
riot_spell_r.description: Taliyah creates a very long wall and then surfs it.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Cast once to create a wall. Recast immediately to ride ahead of the wall. Moving or receiving damage will cause Taliyah to stop.

Weaver's Wall lasts for {{ e1 }} seconds. Deactivate this spell to break the wall early.

riot_spell_i.name: Rock Surfing
riot_spell_i.description: Taliyah gains movement speed near walls.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Rock Surfing
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Taliyah gains movement speed near walls.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Taliyah''' gains up to {{pp|key=%|20 to 45|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, which builds up over 1 second if she had been near terrain or [[:Category:Structures|structures]] for at least {{fd|0.4}} seconds and decays by the {{tt|same amount|more in notes}} if out of [[range]] for at least {{fd|0.8}} seconds.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: Entering combat or casting an ability puts ''Rock Surfing'' on a 2 second {{sti|cooldown}} that is continuously refreshed while remaining in combat.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
* '''Taliyah's''' basic attack disables ''Rock Surfing'' on-hit. If the target dies before the projectile connects, ''Rock Surfing'' will not go on cooldown.
* The build up and decay changes by the same amount in the same interval, which is 25% of the maximum value every {{fd|0.25}} seconds.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Threaded Volley
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Taliyah throws a volley of missiles in a target direction, moving freely as she does. This works the ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on worked ground, she only throws one missile.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} After {{fd|0.25}} seconds, '''Taliyah''' unleashes 5 ''Stone Shards'' in quick succession in the target direction over {{fd|1.5}} seconds, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to the first target hit. Units hit by multiple ''Stone Shards'' take 50% damage beyond the first.
wikia_skill_q1.leveling: {{st|Minimum Magic Damage|{{ap|70 to 170}} {{as|(+ 45% AP)}}|Maximum Single-Target Damage|{{ap|70*3 to 170*3}} {{as|(+ 135% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|70*5 to 170*5}} {{as|(+ 225% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_q1.description2: '''Taliyah''' can move and cast other abilities while launching ''Stone Shards''. After launching the third ''Stone Shard'' she's also able to basic attack.
wikia_skill_q1.description3: Casting ''Threaded Volley'' creates an area of ''Worked Ground'' 450 units radius wide around '''Taliyah''' that lasts {{tt|45|Not affected by cooldown reduction}} seconds. While on ''Worked Ground'', '''Taliyah''' only hurls one ''Stone Shard'' upon casting ''Threaded Volley'', reducing its {{sti|mana|{{as|mana cost to 1}}}}.
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* The first ''Stone Shard'' hit on each target is considered {{tip|single target}} damage and triggers effects such as {{nie|Shock}} from {{ii|Muramana}}, while additional ones of the same cast are considered {{tip|dot|damage-over-time}}.
* The first ''Stone Shard'' is launched instantly after the cast time. After {{fd|0.5}} seconds is then launched the second and after the same delay is then launched the third. After another {{fd|0.25}} seconds is launched the fourth and after the same delay is then launched the fifth.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Seismic Shove
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within in a direction of her choosing.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} After {{fd|0.25}} seconds, '''Taliyah''' marks the target location and selects a direction. After 1 second, the ground erupts, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit and {{tip|airborne|knocking}} them in the chosen direction for 1 second.
wikia_skill_w1.notes: * ''Seismic Shove'' can knock targets over walls.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Unraveled Earth
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield that explodes if enemies dash through it or are pushed/pulled through it.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} After {{fd|0.25}} seconds, '''Taliyah''' scatters 18 boulders over the ground in a cone before her, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit.
wikia_skill_e1.leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|50 to 150}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|50*2 to 150*2}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_e1.description2: The boulders then remain for 4 seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies within the area by 20% {{as|(+ 4% per 100 AP)}}. At the end of their duration, all remaining boulders explode, dealing ''Unraveled Earth's'' initial damage once more.
wikia_skill_e1.description3: Enemies who {{tip|dash}} over or are {{tip|airborne|knocked through}} the boulders will detonate them instantly, each dealing {{as|magic damage}}. Enemies can detonate multiple boulders, but they will only take damage from a maximum of 4, reduced by {{pp|4|changedisplay=true|key=%|type=boulder hit|0 to 45}}.
wikia_skill_e1.leveling3: {{st|Minimum Trigger Damage|{{ap|50 to 90}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Maximum Trigger Damage|{{ap|50*(1+0.85+0.7+0.55) to 90*(1+0.85+0.7+0.55)}} {{as|(+ 93% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* Triggering a boulder deals damage only to the enemy that detonated it.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block one instance of damage.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Weaver's Wall
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Stone Weaver creates a very long wall and then surfs it.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Taliyah''' {{ct|channel|channels|attack=false|move=false|cast=false|consume=Disabled, but can activate trinkets|items=false|spells=false,false,false,interrupts,false}} for 1 second before summoning a massive wall of spiraling rock that tears through the battlefield in the target direction, creating impassable terrain for 5 seconds and {{tip|airborne|knocking aside}} allied and enemy champions it passes through as it emerges.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: '''Taliyah''' can reactivate ''Weaver's Wall'' while channeling to {{tip|dash|ride}} atop the wall at 1500 speed as it emerges. Taking damage during or after the cast time will force her off the wall, which will continue along its path normally. After {{fd|0.75}} seconds she can input a movement command to manually jump off the wall.
wikia_skill_r1.description3: ''Weaver's Wall'' can be reactivated after it reaches its {{tt|maximum range|after 1.75 seconds}} to destroy it instantly.
wikia_skill_r1.notes:
* The {{tip|airborne|knockup}} on allied champions can be used by an enemy {{ci|Yasuo}} to trigger {{ai|Last Breath|Yasuo}}.
* If ''Weaver's Wall'' is allowed to expire normally, the wall collapses with the same progression as it was formed.
* She's more likely to jump off to the left side of ''Weaver's Wall''.

wikia_skill_r2.name: Weaver's Wall
wikia_skill_r2.blurb: Stone Weaver creates a very long wall and then surfs it.
wikia_skill_r2.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Taliyah''' {{ct|channel|channels|attack=false|move=false|cast=false|consume=Disabled, but can activate trinkets|items=false|spells=false,false,false,interrupts,false}} for 1 second before summoning a massive wall of spiraling rock that tears through the battlefield in the target direction, creating impassable terrain for 5 seconds and {{tip|airborne|knocking aside}} allied and enemy champions it passes through as it emerges.
wikia_skill_r2.description2: '''Taliyah''' can reactivate ''Weaver's Wall'' while channeling to {{tip|dash|ride}} atop the wall at 1500 speed as it emerges. Taking damage during or after the cast time will force her off the wall, which will continue along its path normally. After {{fd|0.75}} seconds she can input a movement command to manually jump off the wall.
wikia_skill_r2.description3: ''Weaver's Wall'' can be reactivated after it reaches its {{tt|maximum range|after 1.75 seconds}} to destroy it instantly.
wikia_skill_r2.notes:
* The {{tip|airborne|knockup}} on allied champions can be used by an enemy {{ci|Yasuo}} to trigger {{ai|Last Breath|Yasuo}}.
* If ''Weaver's Wall'' is allowed to expire normally, the wall collapses with the same progression as it was formed.
* She's more likely to jump off to the left side of ''Weaver's Wall''.
